Info.description:
This is HTML text, you can easily change in the XML file, if there is more text this will automatically add the scroll. if you dont write as much text it wont appear.

Im writing a little more to make the scroll appear, you will see that the scroll makes a nice blur effect on the text if you move faster more blur. hope you enjoy.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. mailForm.forUserBody: Thanks for contacting myWebSite, we are going to check your question and reply as soon as possible

news.new: This is an example of your new feature:<font color="#FF0000"> News Ticker</font>
This is HTML Text so you can add LINKS and COLORS
You will be able to define the width of the ticker in the XML file. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident
Enable or disable from the XML file and duration of transition
I have integrated to the same XML file

menu.name: HTML Module w/submenus
menu.submenu:
This is HTML text you can insert links, images, etc; If the text is bigger that the stage height a scroll will appear try reducing the stage height
